name: Just Shoot Demo
description:
This is the demo version of the game.

Game Description

Just Shoot is a shooting game carnage with the added strategy elements of an RTS. Play missions to lay waste to hordes of alien enemies, power up weapons and collect resources in order to improve different aspects and abilities within the game. But remember there is only really one objective. Just Shoot!

Reap chaos across 4 different environmental locations taking on missions as the grunt in the H.D.A (Human Defending Army) as you support the leaders in their quest to take back control of their own planet. Collect resources in order to strengthen the army and its facilities to destroy the enemy in frantic gunfight based battles.

Upgrade Weapons throughout the game to give your character a better chance at surviving. With over 100 different weapons to upgrade it is on you to become the most versatile soldier in the H.D.A.

Customise your character and improve your own abilities to make you a more effective killing machine. Improve your armor, ammo capacity and overall devastation as you build yourself up to be the most respected slayer of aliens to ever grace the planet.

Choose your mission wisely in order to effectively collect your resources and improve your chances in increasingly difficult mission. Defend, escort, and capture your way through 6 different mission types before ultimately dispatching the alien army generals in massive coordinated battles

Upgrade your facilities so that you can spend more time dispatching aliens and less time defending the bases. Speed up build time, upgrade defenses and improve building armor to give yourself the ability to concentrate on killing!

Its on you to strive to maintain your main objective. It;s not that difficult to remember. Repeat after me.

JUST SHOOT!

Features
  • 9 different starting characters
  • Over 100 different weapons
  • 10 different buildings
  • 6 different mission types
  • 4 worlds each with their own Alien general and Epic World Battle
  • More characters and environments to come!

This is the demo version of the game.
